医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
母亲乳化剂的消费与后代的轻度健康风险相关一项针对小鼠的新研究表明，在怀孕或哺乳期间食用乳化剂（超加工人类食品中的常见成分）会对后代造成轻微的健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Maternal-emulsifier-conspiration-linked-with-mild-health-risks-for-offspring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Maternal-emulsifier-conspiration-linked-with-mild-health-risks-for-offspring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02c7a108-0b4f-45df-b93a-7ce9a12f0143 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 22:14:18 -0400 Maternal emulsifier consumption associated with mild health risks for offspring
FDA 根据单一试验批准更多药物，并减少公开披露结果俄勒冈州立大学最近的两项研究发现，美国食品和药物管理局正在批准更多基于单一临床试验的新型药物，并且与几年前相比，这些试验的公开披露较少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/FDA-approves-more-drugs-based-on-single-trials-and-less-public-disclosure-of-results.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/FDA-approves-more-drugs-based-on-single-trials-and-less-public-disclosure-of-results.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a620c1f-0dbe-471f-a1b7-9096e8a750f8 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 22:09:45 -0400 FDA approves more drugs based on single trials and less public disclosure of results
治疗黄斑变性的干细胞贴片进入2b期临床试验南加州大学研究人员为黄斑变性患者开发的干细胞贴片很快将在 2b 期临床试验中进行测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Stem-cell-patch-for-treating-macular-degenesis-to-enter-phase-2b-clinical-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Stem-cell-patch-for-treating-macular-degenesis-to-enter-phase-2b-clinical-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=502cdda7-04c8-4845-b27a-35e383daef48 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 21:17:56 -0400 Stem cell patch for treating macular degeneration to enter phase 2b clinical trial
遗传和环境影响对 SARS-CoV-2 的免疫反应在 COVID-19 大流行期间，在 SARS-CoV-2 感染者中观察到的临床谱从无症状传播到死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Genetics-and-environment-influence-immune-responses-to-SARS-CoV-2.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Genetics-and-environment-influence-immune-responses-to-SARS-CoV-2.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd758be5-ceef-4c44-85c5-db019d39d773 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 21:08:00 -0400 Genetics and environment influence immune responses to SARS-CoV-2
科学家创建新测试来识别有患骨髓性白血病风险的人科学家们创建了一种新的测试，可以比人们提前数年识别出有患急性髓性白血病和相关癌症风险的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Scientists-create-new-test-to-identify-people-at-risk-of-developmenting-myeloid-leukaemias.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Scientists-create-new-test-to-identify-people-at-risk-of-developmenting-myeloid-leukaemias.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e0dad8c-4562-4dd3-a474-de5030c56922 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 21:03:00 -0400 Scientists create new test to identify people at risk of developing myeloid leukemias
患有先兆子痫的女性在怀孕期间会加速衰老先兆子痫是一种危及生命的血压升高，是一种神秘的疾病。每年，它都会导致全球超过 70,000 名女性死亡。由于科学家不知道其原因，因此他们缺乏有针对性的治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Women-with-pre-eclampsia-undergo-accelerated-aging-during-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Women-with-pre-eclampsia-undergo-accelerated-aging-during-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39820f88-17b7-45b6-be6f-b9027840e572 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 20:56:32 -0400 Women with pre-eclampsia undergo accelerated aging during pregnancy
UTMB 研究可能指出拉沙热的有效治疗方法德克萨斯大学医学分部的新研究可能指出拉沙热的有效治疗方法，拉沙热是西非大部分地区常见的一种危险且往往致命的疾病，但被认为是对全球健康的主要威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/UTMB-research-潜在-points-to-an- effective-treatment-for-Lassa-fever.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/UTMB-research-pottially-points-to-an- effective-treatment-for-Lassa-fever.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63a6549b-54ad-498b-aaae-0a3fc48228d2 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 20:47:45 -0400 UTMB research potentially points to an effective treatment for Lassa fever
研究人员发现再生和修复髓磷脂的新生物机制贝勒医学院副教授、德克萨斯儿童医院 Jan and Dan Duncan 神经学研究所研究员 Hyun Kyoung Lee 博士领导的一项研究发现了一种再生和修复髓磷脂的新生物机制，髓磷脂是一种绝缘的保护鞘。神经元纤维在确保快速准确的神经传递中起着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Researchers-discover-new-biological-mechanism-to-regenerate-and-repair-myelin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Researchers-discover-new-biological-mechanism-to-regenerate-and-repair-myelin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d71d4859-9911-4c36-95e1-b5c260baf71c Thu, 24 Aug 2023 20:41:25 -0400 Researchers discover new biological mechanism to regenerate and repair myelin
新模型预测 10 年内死于乳腺癌的风险由纳菲尔德初级保健健康科学系领导的牛津大学研究小组开发了一种新模型，可以可靠地预测女性在十年内患乳腺癌并随后死亡的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/New-model-predicts-10-year-risk-of-dying-from-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/New-model-predicts-10-year-risk-of-dying-from-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8531dde9-82c7-4fd0-ab49-c921527e5ec0 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 14:15:00 -0400 New model predicts 10-year risk of dying from breast cancer
与年龄相关的血液系统变化会加剧结肠癌佛罗里达大学医学院的研究人员发现，血液系统中与年龄相关的常见变化如何使某些结肠癌生长得更快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Age-lated-changes-in-the-blood-system-can-exacerbate-colon-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Age-lated-changes-in-the-blood-system-can-exacerbate-colon-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=baa1d4ea-f459-4238-bc6a-eec543ce3624 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 14:09:41 -0400 Age-related changes in the blood system can exacerbate colon cancer
